schemas.string: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Customer/Customer/CustomerManagementCommonTypes_v4" xmlns:cus="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Customer/BaseTypes/CustomerCommon_v1" xmlns:ex="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Enterprise/BaseTypes/Exceptions_v3" xmlns:iface="http://telus.com/wsdl/SMO/OrderMgmt/ServiceOrderReferenceService_5" xmlns:ping="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Enterprise/BaseTypes/types/ping_v2" xmlns:ref="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Customer/BaseTypes/customer_information_reference_types_1_0" xmlns:shttp="http://soa.com/wsdl/http" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:sor="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/srv/SMO/OrderMgmt/ServiceOrderReferenceServiceRequestResponse_v5" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy" xmlns:wss="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Customer/Customer/CustomerManagementCommonTypes_v4"> <xs:import namespace="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Customer/BaseTypes/CustomerCommon_v1"/> <xs:import namespace="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Customer/BaseTypes/customer_information_reference_types_1_0"/> <xs:simpleType name="ContractTerm"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>TERM_PRESERVE_COMMITMENT = -1; TERM_MONTH_TO_MONTH = 0; TERM_1_YEAR = 12; TERM_2_YEARS = 24; TERM_3_YEARS = 36; TERM_4_YEARS = 48; TERM_5_YEARS = 60; TERM_ALL = 99</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="-1"/> <xs:enumeration value="0"/> <xs:enumeration value="12"/> <xs:enumeration value="24"/> <xs:enumeration value="36"/> <xs:enumeration value="48"/> <xs:enumeration value="60"/> <xs:enumeration value="99"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FundSource"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="-1"/> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="3"/> <!-- -1 Fund Source Not Defined --> <!-- 1 Fund Source Account Balance --> <!-- 2 Fund Source Credit Card --> <!-- 3 Fund Source Bank Card--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubscriptionId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:long"/> </xs:simpleType> <!-- simple types --> <xs:simpleType name="AccountNumber"> <xs:restriction base="cus:billingAccountNumberType"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,8}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CustomerId"> <xs:restriction base="cus:customerIdType"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,8}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubscriberNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{0,19}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillCycle"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,1}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AccountPassword"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S{4,20}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PhoneNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PhoneNumberExtension"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\d{0,4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PoolingGroupId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="3"/> <xs:enumeration value="4"/> <xs:enumeration value="5"/> <xs:enumeration value="6"/> <xs:enumeration value="7"/> <xs:enumeration value="8"/> <!-- AIRTIME --> <!-- DIRECT_CONNECT --> <!-- AIRTIME_AND_DIRECT_CONNECT --> <!-- LONG_DISTANCE --> <!-- DIRECT_CONNECT_LD --> <!-- LONG_DISTANCE_AND_DIRECT_CONNECT_LD --> <!-- ROAMING_AIRTIME --> <!-- ROAMING_LONG_DISTANCE --> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PoolingCoverageType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\p{Lu}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Language"> <xs:restriction base="cus:languageType"> <xs:enumeration value="EN"/> <xs:enumeration value="FR"/> <xs:enumeration value="CA"/> <xs:enumeration value="MA"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OperatorId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\d{1,9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="MemoType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="MemoTypeCategory"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ReasonCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ActivityCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OtherPhoneType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="FAX"/> <xs:enumeration value="PAGER"/> <xs:enumeration value="CVMS"/> <xs:enumeration value="MOBILE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CorporateId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TaxExemptCertNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{15}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="NameFormat"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <!-- Private --> <!-- Business --> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillState"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <!-- Billed --> <!-- Unbilled --> <!-- All --> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PaymentAmount"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\-{0,1}\d{1,}\.\d{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PaymentType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <!-- Bill --> <!-- Deposit --> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="InvoiceStatus"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="O"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="BankAccount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="bankCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="bankAccountNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="bankBranchNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="bankAccountHolder" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="bankAccountType" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Cheque"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="number" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="bankAccount" type="BankAccount"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="AddressType"> <xs:restriction base="cus:addressTypeCodeType"> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <!-- City --> <!-- Rural --> <!-- Foreign --> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ProvinceCode"> <xs:restriction base="cus:provinceStateCodeType"> <xs:enumeration value="AB"/> <xs:enumeration value="BC"/> <xs:enumeration value="MB"/> <xs:enumeration value="NB"/> <xs:enumeration value="NF"/> <xs:enumeration value="NT"/> <xs:enumeration value="NS"/> <xs:enumeration value="ON"/> <xs:enumeration value="PE"/> <xs:enumeration value="PQ"/> <xs:enumeration value="SK"/> <xs:enumeration value="YT"/> <xs:enumeration value="NU"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PostalCode"> <xs:restriction base="cus:postalZipCodeType"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]\d[A-Z]\d[A-Z]\d"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ProductType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\p{Lu}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BrandId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,21}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Month"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="MonthDay"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="31"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditClass"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ActivationOptionNameType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Enum mastered from CreditProfileSvc (HCD) system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Deposit"/> <xs:enumeration value="CreditLimit"/> <xs:enumeration value="CreditLimitAndDeposit"/> <xs:enumeration value="DifferentiatedCredit"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DealerCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SalesRepCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CoverageType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="EXTENDED"/> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL"/> <xs:enumeration value="US"/> <xs:enumeration value="WIDE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CategoryCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ServiceType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\p{Lu}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="WPSServiceType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="TRACKING"/> <xs:enumeration value="PROMOTIONAL"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EquipmentType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\p{Lu}|\p{Nd}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EquipmentSerialNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="IMSIType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PricePlanCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ServiceCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FeatureCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BusinessRole"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="AGENT"/> <xs:enumeration value="AGENTACTV"/> <xs:enumeration value="DEALER"/> <xs:enumeration value="DEALERACTV"/> <xs:enumeration value="CLIENT"/> <xs:enumeration value="CLIENTACTV"/> <xs:enumeration value="IVRCLIENT"/> <xs:enumeration value="CORPORATE"/> <xs:enumeration value="CORPRTSTR"/> <xs:enumeration value="RETAILSTR"/> <xs:enumeration value="CNTRENEWAL"/> <xs:enumeration value="CNTRNCORP"/> <xs:enumeration value="AGENTLNR"/> <xs:enumeration value="ALL"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Privilege"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DISPLAY"/> <xs:enumeration value="ACTIVATEAGENTACTV"/> <xs:enumeration value="ADD"/> <xs:enumeration value="REMOVE"/> <xs:enumeration value="RTNONCHNG"/> <xs:enumeration value="RTNONRENEW"/> <xs:enumeration value="AUTOADD"/> <xs:enumeration value="ADDAOM"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!-- complex types --> <xs:complexType name="Address"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="addressType" type="AddressType"/> <xs:element type="cus:renderedAddressType"/> <xs:element name="city" nillable="true" type="cus:municipalityNameType"/> <xs:element name="province" nillable="true" type="ProvinceCode"/> <xs:element <xs:element name="civicNoSuffix" nillable="true" type="cus:civicNumberSuffixType"/> <xs:element name="streetNumber" nillable="true" type="cus:civicNumberType"/> <xs:element name="streetNumberSuffix" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="streetDirection" nillable="true" type="cus:streetDirectionCodeType"/> <xs:element name="streetName" nillable="true" type="cus:streetNameType"/> <xs:element name="streetType" nillable="true" type="cus:streetTypeCodeType"/> <xs:element name="unitType" nillable="true" type="cus:unitTypeCodeType"/> <xs:element name="unit" nillable="true" <xs:element name="ruralDeliveryType" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ruralGroup" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ruralNumber" nillable="true" type="cus:ruralRouteNumberType"/> <xs:element name="ruralType" nillable="true" type="cus:ruralRouteTypeCodeType"/> <xs:element name="zipGeoCode" nillable="true" type="cus:postalZipCodeType"/> <xs:element name="foreignState" nillable="true" type="cus:provinceStateCodeType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ValidationMessage"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="Address"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1000" name="validationMessages" type="ValidationMessage"/> <xs:element name="countValidationMessages" type="SubscriberNumber"/> <xs:element name="dueDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="phoneNumber" nillable="true" type="PhoneNumber"/> <xs:element name="productType" type="ProductType"/> <xs:element name="text" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element default="false" name="considerBillingAccountStampInd" nillable="true" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="openDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="closeDate" nillable="true" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="operatorId" nillable="true" type="OperatorId"/> <xs:element name="openedBy" nillable="true" type="OperatorId"/> <xs:element name="closedBy" nillable="true" type="OperatorId"/> <xs:element name="assignedToWorkPositionId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="closeReasonCode" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1000" name="additionalTextList" nillable="true" type="FollowUpText"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="driversLicenseProvince" nillable="true" type="ProvinceCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="BusinessCreditInformation"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="depositList" type="CreditCheckResultDeposit"/> <xs:element name="creditScore" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="referToCreditAnalyst" type="ReferToCreditAnalyst"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="bureauFile" type="xs:base64Binary"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditCheckResultDeposit"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="productType" type="ProductType"/> <xs:element name="depositAmount" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EligibilityResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="100" minOccurs="0" name="activationOptionList" type="ActivationOption"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditDecision" type="CreditDecision"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="serviceDeclined" type="ServiceDeclined"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="referToCreditAnalyst" type="ReferToCreditAnalyst"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ActivationOption"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The activation optiona customer is eligible for. e.g. Deposit, CLP,....</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="activationOptionName" type="ActivationOptionNameType"/> <xs:element name="creditClass" type="CreditClass"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditLimitAmount" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="depositAmount" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="maxCLPContractTerm" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Maximum CLP contract term length allowed (in months).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditDecision"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Credit decision message as defined in external Credit bureau for TELUS. e.g. M01 - Approved. No deposit required. </xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="creditDecisionMessage" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="creditDecisionMessageFrench" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceDeclined"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="serviceDeclinedInd" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="reasonCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="reasonMessage" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReferToCreditAnalyst"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="referToCreditAnalystInd" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="reasonCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="reasonMessage" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RewardRedemptionResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="rewardEligibleInd" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="rewardEligibilityAmount" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentMethod"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="paymentMethod" type="xs:string"> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditCard" type="CreditCard"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="cheque" type="Cheque"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="statusReason" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="startDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="endDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="suppressReturnEnvelopeInd" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FinancialHistory"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="debtSummary" type="DebtSummary"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1000" name="monthlyFinancialActivities" nillable="true" type="MonthlyFinancialActivity"/> <xs:element name="delinquentInd" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="writtenOffInd" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="lastPaymentAmount" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="lastPaymentDate" type="xs:date"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="DebtSummary"> name="billingAccountAssociationId" nillable="true" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="masterAccountSystemCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="masterAccountId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentMethodAuthorization"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="authorizationNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="referenceNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="cardVerificationDataResult" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="globalPaymentResponseCode" type="xs:string"/> from the subsystem.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SubSystemErrorList"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.telus.com/eca/common_types_2_1" xmlns:ex="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Enterprise/BaseTypes/Exceptions_v3" xmlns:iface="http://telus.com/wsdl/SMO/OrderMgmt/ServiceOrderReferenceService_5" xmlns:ping="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Enterprise/BaseTypes/types/ping_v2" xmlns:shttp="http://soa.com/wsdl/http" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:sor="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/srv/SMO/OrderMgmt/ServiceOrderReferenceServiceRequestResponse_v5" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.telus.com/eca/common_types_2_1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy" xmlns:wss="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://schemas.telus.com/eca/common_types_2_1">
<!-- simple types --> <xs:simpleType name="AccountNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,8}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="CustomerId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,8}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="SubscriberNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{0,19}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="BrandId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,21}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="CreditScenario"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\p{Lu}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="OtherPhoneType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="FAX"/> <xs:enumeration value="PAGER"/> <xs:enumeration value="CVMS"/> <xs:enumeration value="MOBILE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="PhoneNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="PhoneNumberExtension"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\d{0,4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="BillCycle"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,1}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="SerialNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\d{1,20}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="ProductType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\p{Lu}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="PoolingGroupId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <!-- AIRTIME --> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> <!-- DIRECT_CONNECT --> <xs:enumeration value="3"/> <!-- AIRTIME_AND_DIRECT_CONNECT --> <xs:enumeration value="4"/> <!-- LONG_DISTANCE --> <xs:enumeration value="5"/> <!-- DIRECT_CONNECT_LD --> <xs:enumeration value="6"/> <!-- LONG_DISTANCE_AND_DIRECT_CONNECT_LD --> <xs:enumeration value="7"/> <!-- ROAMING_AIRTIME --> <xs:enumeration value="8"/> <!-- ROAMING_LONG_DISTANCE --> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="PoolingCoverageType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\p{Lu}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="BillState"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <!-- Billed --> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <!-- Unbilled --> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <!-- All --> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="Amount"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\-{0,1}\d{1,}\.\d{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="ProvinceCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="AB"/> <xs:enumeration value="BC"/> <xs:enumeration value="MB"/> <xs:enumeration value="NB"/> <xs:enumeration value="NF"/> <xs:enumeration value="NT"/> <xs:enumeration value="NS"/> <xs:enumeration value="ON"/> <xs:enumeration value="PE"/> <xs:enumeration value="PQ"/> <xs:enumeration value="SK"/> <xs:enumeration value="YT"/> <xs:enumeration value="NU"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="DealerCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="SalesRepCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

<xs:simpleType name="ServiceCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

<xs:simpleType name="ReasonCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

<xs:simpleType name="PostalCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]\d[A-Z]\d[A-Z]\d"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

<xs:simpleType name="MonthDay"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="31"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

<xs:simpleType name="CategoryCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{1,6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="ServiceType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\p{Lu}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

<xs:simpleType name="EquipmentType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\p{Lu}|\p{Nd}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="CorporateId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}\d{0,9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="TaxExemptCertNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.{15}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

This operation should only be called if the Service Object (returned from other operations) has the alternateRecurringChargeInd to TRUE. Note that the charges are retrieved from batch_pp_rc_rate table.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="auditInfo" type="ect:AuditInfo"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="20" name="serviceCodeList" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="provinceCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="npaNXX" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="corporateId" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getAlternateRecurringChargeResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="getAlternateRecurringChargeResponseType" type="tns:GetAlternateRecurringChargeResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getPricePlanByEquipmentAndAccountByBusinessRole"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This method retrieves the price plan by equipment type and account info.
